scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/api build && pnpm -C apps/web build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/api lint && pnpm -C apps/web lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm -C apps/api lint:fix && pnpm -C apps/web lint:fix
scripts.format: pnpm -C apps/api format && pnpm -C apps/web format
scripts.format:check: pnpm -C apps/api format:check && pnpm -C apps/web format:check
